oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Dotz benzannulation route to the enantioselective synthesis of (-)- and (+)-juglomycin A
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: FERNANDES, RA
CHAVAN, VP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ENANTIODIVERGENT TOTAL SYNTHESES
FRENOLICIN-B
ASYMMETRIC DIHYDROXYLATION
CRISAMICIN-A
EFFICIENT SYNTHESIS
KALAFUNGIN
ANTIBIOTICS
ACIDS
(-)-NANAOMYCIN-D
DEOXYFRENOLICIN
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two synthetic routes based on a Dotz benzannulation toward the enantioselective synthesis of naphthoquinone antibiotics (-)- and (+)-juglomycin A are described. The stereoinducing step is based on asymmetric dihydroxylation. The syntheses are completed in seven to eight steps from Fischer carbene 12. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
